description: InMobi is worlds largest independent mobile advertising network serving 138 billion ads per month. PostgreSQL is one of the data stores behind this scale and this talk is about various issues which we encountered in production and also how did we solve the same. I would like to share in depth knowledge and my experience after solving these issues.

title: HawkEye On Postgresql
